text: You might know everything I'm going to do, but that's not going to help you, since I know everything ''you're'' going to do! STRANGE, isn't it?! GRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!

author: Shadow the YouTuber

text: It's really different from the other Sonic games from it's era.  If you try to just blow though each stage as in the other games, it is really short and disappointing.  To get the most out of it, you really have to be playing for the good ending (finding and destroying all the robot generators in the past version of each stage).

author: Sayeth Di Puppeth

text: I'm split on the soundtracks. Some of the US tracks were good, some even better than the JP/EU version (Metallic Madness Bad Future for example. The JP version had some weird engrishy psuedo-rap into it, while the US version fit the zone better, making the place feel like a high-tech area gone to hell), some are fairly even, like Stardust Speedway Bad Future, and some where the JP versions are better. It makes me kind of sad that you can't chose to mix and match the tracks in the latest version.
